channel.title: Dotnettips.wordpress.com on .NET Ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Dotnettips.wordpress.com on .NET Ramblings

item.title: Boost Your .NET Projects: Find the Fastest Way to Get an Item’s Index in Arrays
item.description: This article examines the performance of three index-finding methods in .NET arrays: Array.BinarySearch (O(log n)), Array.FindIndex (O(n)), and Array.IndexOf (O(n)). Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2025/08/31/boost-your-net-projects-find-the-fastest-way-to-get-an-items-index-in-arrays/

item.title: Boost Your .NET Projects: Harness the Power of Async Queues with Spargine’s ChannelQueue
item.description: The Spargine library introduces ChannelQueue, an efficient, thread-safe queue for .NET asynchronous programming, addressing the lack of a built-in async queue. It supports various features like async operations, bounded capacities, cancellation, and batch processing, making it ideal for managing async data flows and enhancing application responsiveness. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2025/08/24/boost-your-net-projects-harness-the-power-of-async-queues-with-spargines-channelqueue/
